info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 3:26PM CDT until May 13 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Clinton County in south central Illinois... Southeastern Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Northeastern St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... * Until 415 PM CDT. * At 325 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Troy, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, Collinsville, Edwardsville, Fairview Heights, Glen Carbon, Shiloh, Highland, Troy, Maryville, Mascoutah, Lebanon, Caseyville, New Baden, Scott AFB, Trenton, Aviston, Albers, St. Jacob, Marine, and Pierron. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 21 and 30. Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 12 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
